name: Eudia Transcription Plugin
description: Record meetings, transcribe with AI, sync to Salesforce. Native calendar integration, smart tagging, and precision sales intelligence extraction.
author: Eudia
releaseNotes: v4.7.3: Critical fix for long recording transcription failures. Recordings over 20 minutes now use chunked transcription to avoid server timeouts. Auto-heals any notes with previous 'Transcription failed' errors by re-processing saved recordings. Fixed processing indicator cleanup. Improved error messages with recovery hints.
